feature_five_text: This tool is designed for all users, advanced knowledge is not required. So, It's easy to compress PDF files.
feature_four_text: Working with Compress PDF is absolutely secure. Files are deleted permanently after one hour.
feature_one_text: Thanks to its powerful processing capabilities, this tool is able to compress PDF file in a shorter amount of time.
feature_six_text: You can access or use the Compress PDF Tool online on the Internet using any browser from any operating system.
feature_three_text: This tool enables you to compress and rotate PDF files, giving you complete control over the final document before saving it.
feature_two_text: You can use this Compress PDF tool online for free and with no limits on the number of times you can use it to compress PDF files.
how_to_title: How to Compress PDF File Online for Free
how_to_step_four: Click on the 'Download' button to download the compressed PDF file.
how_to_step_one: Click on the 'Choose File' button and select or drag and drop the PDF file(s) into the tool.
how_to_step_three: Select compression level and click on Compress PDF to start the compression.
how_to_step_two: Add more files and rotate PDF documents if necessary and click Select Compression Level.
files_already_compressed: We are sorry, these files are very well compressed and we can't compress them without quality loss.
file_already_compressed: We are sorry, this file is very well compressed and we can't compress it without quality loss.
page_header_text: Reduce file size while maintaining maximal PDF quality.
